Articles.Content: Trying to make my own triboosters made the VAB have a siezure...

I had a problem that looked exactly like this yesterday (running 0.90 stock on OSX). When I forcequit and restarted KSP, everything worked fine except that the new/save/load buttons in the VAB didn't work. After a little research I found that the problem was an error in the creation of the .craft file leading to KSP bugging out whenever it would attempt to preload that .craft file (such as inside the VAB).

The solution was to look at all your VAB .craft files (located somewhere like /"Kerbal Space Program"/saves/$PlayerName/ships/VAB) and delete the malformed .craft file. Probably it is a lot smaller than the others, disproportionately smaller for its estimated part count than it should be, or created more recently than your other ships. If you suspect several files, move them out of your VAB folder, run KSP, and add them back in one at a time until you find the offender. Good luck.
